[Solar Rejuvenation (Ghoran)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3956) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 39</row>

</column>

---

The warmth and light of the sun gives you life. If you rest outdoors for 10 minutes during the day, you regain Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier × half your level. You gain this benefit in addition to any healing from [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57).
name: Solar Rejuvenation (Ghoran)
